verses.verse: Ye are the children <WH1121> of Jehovah <WH3068> your God <WH430>: ye shall not cut <WH1413> yourselves <WH7760>, nor make any baldness <WH7144> between your eyes <WH5869> for the dead <WH4191>.

For thou art a holy <WH6918> people <WH5971> unto Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430>, and Jehovah <WH3068> hath chosen <WH977> thee to be a people <WH5971> for his own possession <WH5459>, above all peoples <WH5971> that are upon <WH6440> the face of the earth <WH127>.
Thou shalt not eat <WH398> any abominable thing <WH8441>.
These are the beasts <WH929> which ye may eat <WH398>: the ox <WH7794>, the sheep <WH7716>, and the goat <WH5795>,
the hart <WH354>, and the gazelle <WH6643>, and the roebuck <WH6643>, and the wild goat <WH689>, and the pygarg <WH1788>, and the antelope <WH8377>, and the chamois <WH2169>.

And every beast <WH929> that parteth <WH6536> the hoof <WH6541>, and hath the hoof <WH6541> cloven <WH8157> in <WH8156> two <WH8147>, and cheweth <WH5927> the cud <WH1625>, among the beasts <WH929>, that may ye eat <WH398>.

Nevertheless these ye shall not eat <WH398> of them that chew <WH5927> the cud <WH1625>, or of them that have the <WH6536> hoof <WH6541> cloven <WH8156>: the camel <WH1581>, and the hare <WH768>, and the coney <WH8227>; because they chew <WH5927> the cud <WH1625> but part <WH6536> not the hoof <WH6541>, they are unclean unto you <WH2931>.

And the swine <WH2386>, because he parteth <WH6536> the hoof <WH6541> but cheweth not the cud <WH1625>, he is unclean <WH2931> unto you <WH1320>: of their flesh ye shall not eat <WH398>, and their carcasses <WH5038> ye shall not touch <WH5060>.
These ye may eat <WH398> of all that are in the waters <WH4325>: whatsoever hath fins <WH5579> and scales <WH7193> may ye eat <WH398>;
and whatsoever hath not fins <WH5579> and scales <WH7193> ye shall not eat <WH398>; it is unclean unto you <WH2931>.
Of all clean <WH2889> birds <WH6833> ye may eat <WH398>.
But these are they of which ye shall not eat <WH398>: the eagle <WH5404>, and the gier-eagle <WH6538>, and the ospray <WH5822>,
and the glede <WH7201>, and the falcon <WH344>, and the kite <WH344> after its kind <WH4327>,
and every raven <WH6158> after its kind <WH4327>,
and the ostrich <WH1323>, and the night-hawk <WH8464>, and the sea-mew <WH7828>, and the hawk <WH8464> after its kind <WH4327>,
the little owl <WH3563>, and the great owl <WH3244>, and the horned owl <WH8580>,
and the pelican <WH6893>, and the vulture <WH7360>, and the cormorant <WH7994>,
and the stork <WH2624>, and the heron <WH601> after its kind <WH4327>, and the hoopoe <WH1744>, and the bat <WH5847>.
And all winged <WH5775> creeping things <WH8318> are unclean <WH2931> unto you <WH398>: they shall not be eaten.
Of all clean <WH2889> birds <WH5775> ye may eat <WH398>.

Ye shall not eat <WH398> of anything that dieth of itself <WH5038>: thou mayest give <WH5414> it unto the sojourner <WH1616> that is within thy gates <WH8179>, that he may eat <WH398> it <WH4376>; or thou mayest sell it unto a foreigner <WH5237>: for thou art a holy <WH6918> people <WH5971> unto Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430>. Thou shalt not boil <WH1310> a kid <WH1423> in its mother <WH517>'s milk <WH2461>.
Thou shalt surely <WH6237> tithe <WH6237> all the increase <WH8393> of thy seed <WH2233>, that which cometh forth <WH3318> from the field <WH7704> year <WH8141> by year <WH8141>.

And thou shalt eat <WH398> before <WH6440> Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430>, in the place <WH4725> which he shall choose <WH977>, to cause his name <WH8034> to dwell <WH7931> there <WH4643>, the tithe of thy grain <WH1715>, of thy new wine <WH8492>, and of thine oil <WH3323>, and the firstlings <WH1062> of thy herd <WH1241> and of thy flock <WH6629>; that thou mayest learn <WH3925> to fear <WH3372> Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430> always <WH3117>.

And if the way <WH1870> be too long <WH7235> for thee <WH3588>, so that thou art not able <WH3201> to carry <WH5375> it <WH4725>, because the place is too far <WH7368> from thee <WH3068>, which Jehovah thy God <WH430> shall choose <WH977>, to set <WH7760> his name <WH8034> there <WH3068>, when Jehovah thy God <WH430> shall bless thee <WH1288>;

then shalt thou turn <WH5414> it into money <WH3701>, and bind up <WH6696> the money <WH3701> in thy hand <WH3027>, and shalt go <WH1980> unto the place <WH4725> which Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430> shall choose <WH977>:

and thou shalt bestow <WH5414> the money <WH3701> for whatsoever thy soul <WH5315> desireth <WH183>, for oxen <WH1241>, or for sheep <WH6629>, or for wine <WH3196>, or for strong drink <WH7941>, or for whatsoever thy soul <WH5315> asketh <WH7592> of thee <WH398>; and thou shalt eat there before <WH6440> Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430>, and thou shalt rejoice <WH8055>, thou and thy household <WH1004>.
And the Levite <WH3881> that is within thy gates <WH8179>, thou shalt not forsake <WH5800> him <WH2506>; for he hath no portion nor inheritance with thee <WH5159>.

At the end <WH7097> of every three <WH7969> years <WH8141> thou shalt bring forth <WH3318> all the tithe <WH4643> of thine increase <WH8393> in the same year <WH8141>, and shalt lay it up <WH3240> within thy gates <WH8179>:

and the Levite <WH3881>, because he hath no portion <WH2506> nor inheritance <WH5159> with thee <WH1616>, and the sojourner, and the fatherless <WH3490>, and the widow <WH490>, that are within thy gates <WH8179>, shall come <WH935>, and shall eat <WH398> and be satisfied <WH7646>; that Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430> may bless <WH1288> thee in all the work <WH4639> of thy hand <WH3027> which thou doest <WH6213>.
